general.errorGeneral: Something went wrong. Try again later.
general.selectTwoIngredients: We recommend using max two fruits.
general.noRecipeFound: Sorry, no recipes found. Try adding an additional ingredient.

recipeCard.tooltipOnNoAction: Try swapping ingredients or adding more flavors to your recipe

recipePage.tip: Tip! Click on ingredient to see substitutes

flavorOverlay.loaderTextFlavor: AI is finding new flavors that match your recipe
flavorOverlay.tooltip: Get new flavor matches for your new ingredients
flavorOverlay.whatIsMatchTextShort: Ingredient matches are ingredients that fit well with the other selected ingredients to make a great tasting dish.
flavorOverlay.whatIsMatchTextLong: The ingredient matches are proposed by our artificial intelligence, which has learned from millions of recipes what fits well together and what doesn’t. The best matches are always shown first.

substitutionOverlay.findingSubstitutes: The artificial intelligence is finding substitutes

survey.consentHeder: Help us train the recipe AI
survey.consentText: We would love to gather statistics from your clicks to analyse and improve the recipes and foodpairing AI. To learn more, check out our
survey.consentTextAldi: We do not capture any of your data. If you have any questions or comments about the data, reach out to the startup behind this app: Plant Jammer.
survey.typeformText: Want to answer 3 questions on food waste, to help us fight this global issue?
survey.npsQuestion: How likely are you to recommend this tool to a friend or colleague?
survey.whatGood: Great! What did you like about this tool?
survey.trackExplain: We track statistical data on your selections of the following: ingredients, recipes and filters (such as diets or cuisine)

shoppingList.youMightHave: You might have this at home
